samples.text: A totally original Arturia design, Delay Eternity takes a deceptively simple digital delay and transforms it into something breathtaking.

samples.name: granular drums
samples.desc: Deconstruct and make a mess out of any source in real time! LFO modulations twist the delay, the fade mode keeps the pitch steady when changing delay time.

samples.name: repeater synth
samples.desc: Use the powerful modulation routing to make your instruments delay or repeat only at set times in the bar, perfectly sync'd to your DAW.

samples.name: dynamic pitch guitar
samples.desc: You can get totally bizarre, forced-pitch melodic parts using the pitch-levelling “repitch” mode, being controlled by the deep modulation. Bizarre, and hugely fun.
